name: A Buoyant Breeze
description: Venti's specialty. Other than the Cecilia flowers used for decoration, the ingredients are no different from normal. But if you taste it carefully, you can taste the flavor of "a wind that brings hope and tiny twists of fate." Perhaps...this is exactly what he wants.
effect: Decreases all party members' gliding and sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 1,800s.
